bibl.title: Letter from Marshall Price to Howard A. Kelly, [February 1908]

div1.p: Price thanks Kelly for submitting a deposition in support of a pension for Jennie Carroll.

div1.head: Letter from Marshall Price to Howard A. Kelly, [February 1908]
div1.opener:
Prob Feb 1908
See Price (Feb 4, 1908) to Kell
L.
Dr. Howard Kelly
1418 Eutaw Place
my dear Dr. Kelly
div1.p:
Please accept my
thanks for this deposition
which is just received.
I am sure it will be
of the greatest service
to Mrs. Carroll and her
family.
div1.closer:
Sincerely Yours- Marshall Langton Price per.
H. A. Price
